column3:
うーん…
アレ… なんて言うんだっけ…
「り」で始まって
「く」で終わるんだけどな…
column4:
Hrm... What's that word? It's on the
tip of my tongue, but I just can't think
of it...
It starts with L...ends in K...
What is it, though...

column3:
そうそう…
川の上から どんぶらこと流れてくる…
って それは流木
それじゃないんですよね
column4:
Isn't that when you kinda sneak around
and listen in on others? I think it is...
The word sounds like that too...
Not the word I was thinking of, though.

column3:
そうそう…
立ちながら ご飯を食べるんですよね
って… それは立食
違うんですよね
column4:
Oh, that word... That's when you use
your tongue to taste something, right?
Yeah... \"Lick.\" Hrm.
Not the word I wanted, though.

column3:
私怒ってます！

って… それは立腹
他にないですか？
column4:
Ooh, the long vegetable! Wait... Is it a
vegetable? I actually don't know.

Regardless, not the word I was
looking for.

column3:
そうそう…
ハイリアの英傑だった人らしいですよね
って… あなたのことですよ
リンクさん
column4:
Oh, right... The Hylian Champion, or
so I've heard...somewhere...

That's you, right? You're Link.

column3: また会えましたね リンクさん
